name: Void.exe
description:
Can you escape?

"Hello"

"Welcome to The Void"

"The object that is glowing green"

"Is known as a shard"

"You need to collect 20 shards to escape"

"Shards stay with you"

"Even if you die"

"*Awkward Pause*"

"The object glowing red"

"Will progress you to the next level"

"*Dramatic Pause*"

"You are not alone"

"You are being stalked by t-posing specters"

"Good Luck"
